attacks.name: Sharpshooting
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bone Windmill
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
